attributes.review: The overall look was pretty good but it’s hard to use tbh. It just smelled so terrible! I was probably stank up by trump himself but i wouldn’t know. Please do something about the smell thank you 🙏.
attributes.title: the smell 🤢

attributes.review: I can’t stay on the app for more than 30 seconds without it crashing, not to mention the spread of hatred and stories twisted to fit republican ideals.
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: I’m confused on why I did what it said and never got a answer I’m never downloading another app about Donald trump again it’s just disappointing
attributes.title: What’s up with him not answering

attributes.review: i decided to download this app to get more 😼educated😼 on whats going on in the world, but after downloading it i can confirm that it is 𝓿𝓮𝓻𝔂 𝓶𝓾𝓬𝓱 𝓷𝓸𝓽 𝓰𝓸𝓸𝓭. about a week after i downloaded it, i started hearing strange noises coming from my ceiling. i got my family involved and we started investigating. fortunately, it was just an 𝚊𝚕𝚒𝚎𝚗. no biggie. still don’t like the app tho❤️
attributes.title: very much not good

attributes.review: This app is not good at all I was SO excited for it too, unfortunate. They should take it out of the App Store honestly. So so bad, never seen an app lack so much quality.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review:
my dad is an awful man. he won’t let me have any social media and i can’t even talk to him most of the time. i can confirm that his spray tan isn’t even a good brand, it’s from dollar tree. i saw that people were trying to save me so thank you, just so you know i will be leaving my window open so that i can be rescued. #saveme2020 #obama2020
#settleforbiden
attributes.title: don’t vote for him pls

attributes.review: The app itself isn’t working well on my phone. It keeps shutting itself down so it’s hard to use it.
attributes.title: App not working

attributes.review: This app is very glitchy, confusing to use and it’s an overall unpleasant experience downloading this app.
attributes.title: Save yourself the time, don’t download this app

attributes.review: Every time I try to open the app it kicks me out. What is the point of making an app if you can’t even use it?
attributes.title: The app crashed

attributes.review:
This app is not what I thought it was gonna be. It spammed my phone and it started to glitch. I have a brand new phone so I don’t know why it did that.  

Ps. BLACK LIVES MATTER ✊🏾
attributes.title: It took over my phone
